name: part_002
file: tmp_【#紫咲シオン生誕祭2021】いっぱいありがとう！！Birthday Live2021【ホロライブ⧸紫咲シオン】 [oLZxkEJAm8U]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Birthday Live 2021 celebration with a giant cake and photo session.
Murasaki Shion welcomes Houshou Marine to the stage.
Performance of "Ojamamushi" by Murasaki Shion and Houshou Marine.

subtitles.original: 変に刺さったりしないか...？
subtitles.english: I hope it doesn't get stuck weirdly...?

subtitles.original: うぉーーー！
subtitles.english: Wooooo!

subtitles.original: 野生のケーキだ！
subtitles.english: It's a wild cake!

subtitles.original: こんなところに野生のケーキが現れた！
subtitles.english: A wild cake has appeared in a place like this!

subtitles.original: えっと、みんな写真撮る写真！
subtitles.english: Um, everyone, take pictures! Pictures!

subtitles.original: インスタ映え写真撮ってインスタ映え写真！
subtitles.english: Take an Instagram-worthy picture! Instagram-worthy!

subtitles.original: ほら、いいじゃんいいじゃん！
subtitles.english: Look, it's good, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 見て、ほら！
subtitles.english: Look, see!

subtitles.original: ほら、イエーイ！ほら！
subtitles.english: Look, yay! Look!

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Okay!

subtitles.original: こっちか？
subtitles.english: This way?

subtitles.original: はい、チーズ！
subtitles.english: Say cheese!

subtitles.original: え、やったー！
subtitles.english: Oh, yay!

subtitles.original: ほら、1歳かなこれは？
subtitles.english: Look, am I one year old?

subtitles.original: もう1歳なのかな？
subtitles.english: Am I already one?

subtitles.original: 食べたいなーケーキ。
subtitles.english: I want to eat it... the cake.

subtitles.original: 食べちゃおうかなー。
subtitles.english: Maybe I'll eat it.

subtitles.original: あ、こんなところにフォークもあった！
subtitles.english: Oh, there's even a fork here!

subtitles.original: 食べちゃお！
subtitles.english: Let's eat!

subtitles.original: もぐもぐもぐ...
subtitles.english: Munch munch munch...

subtitles.original: あ、うめーな、やっぱケーキ！
subtitles.english: Ah, it's so good, as expected of cake!

subtitles.original: ちょっとほら、ほら！
subtitles.english: Wait, look, look!

subtitles.original: ほら、みんなも食べる？
subtitles.english: Here, do you all want some too?

subtitles.original: みんなも「あーん」あげない！
subtitles.english: Say "ahhh" for everyone... psych! Not giving you any!

subtitles.original: 全部完食するからね、これ、ホールケーキ！
subtitles.english: I'm going to finish this whole cake, you know!

subtitles.original: ね、みんなも食べていいよ、ほら！
subtitles.english: Hey, you all can eat some too, look!

subtitles.original: あげないけど！
subtitles.english: Though I'm not giving you any!

subtitles.original: あげないけど！
subtitles.english: Though I'm not giving you any!

subtitles.original: 絶対あげないけど！
subtitles.english: I'm definitely not giving you any!

subtitles.original: 絶対あげないけど！
subtitles.english: I'm definitely not giving you any!

subtitles.original: まあ見せてあげる、見せてあげる断面とかね、ケーキの断面とか！
subtitles.english: Well, I'll show you, I'll show you the cross-section of the cake!

subtitles.original: ほら、見せてあげる、はい！
subtitles.english: Look, I'll show you, here!

subtitles.original: やー、美味しいな、やっぱ！
subtitles.english: Man, it's so delicious after all!

subtitles.original: ショートケーキうめー！
subtitles.english: Shortcake is the best!

subtitles.original: イチゴがね、イチゴが美味しいから、生クリームも好きだけど！
subtitles.english: The strawberries, the strawberries are delicious, and I like the whipped cream too!

subtitles.original: 生クリームも好きだけど！
subtitles.english: I like the whipped cream too!

subtitles.original: あ、もう1個しかないよ！1個しかない！
subtitles.english: Oh, there's only one left! Only one!

subtitles.original: あ、もぐもぐもぐ...
subtitles.english: Ah, munch munch munch...

subtitles.original: はい、なくなった！完食！ホールケーキ完食！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: And it's gone! Finished! I finished the whole cake! Yay!

subtitles.original: ほら、みんな食べました、証拠！
subtitles.english: Look, everyone, I ate it all! Proof!

subtitles.original: 食べました証拠写真、食べました！
subtitles.english: A photo of the proof that I ate it! I ate it!

subtitles.original: これ、フォーク、どこに刺したいな...？
subtitles.english: This fork, where should I stick it...?

subtitles.original: どこだったっけな...？
subtitles.english: Where was it again...?

subtitles.original: ほらー！ほらー！
subtitles.english: Look! Look!

subtitles.original: はい、いやー満足だな、今日の誕生日、もうこれで大満足！
subtitles.english: Okay, wow, I'm so satisfied, I'm already fully satisfied with today's birthday!

subtitles.original: え、ちょっと終わろうかな、そろそろ配信も、大満足したし！
subtitles.english: Um, maybe I should end the stream soon, since I'm fully satisfied!

subtitles.original: いや、でもな、一人で楽しみすぎてさ、やっぱせっかくだからさ、誰かに祝ってほしいよね！
subtitles.english: No, but wait, I enjoyed myself too much alone, so since it's a special occasion, I want someone to celebrate with me!

subtitles.original: 一人でも、一人でもいいんだけどね！いいんだけど、まあせっかくならよ！
subtitles.english: Being alone, being alone is fine too! It's fine, but since it's a special occasion!

subtitles.original: 誰か来てくんないかな？ちょっと暇そうな人探してこようかな、ちょっと！
subtitles.english: I wonder if anyone will come? Maybe I'll go look for someone who seems free for a bit!

subtitles.original: ちょっと暇そうな人探してくるわ、みんな！ちょっと待ってて、ここで！
subtitles.english: I'm going to look for someone who seems free, everyone! Wait here for a bit!

subtitles.original: 見てくる、ちょっとそこら辺！
subtitles.english: I'll go check around there!

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って、行ってくるわ！
subtitles.english: Wait a second, I'm going!

subtitles.original: みんな、暇な人連れてきたよー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, I brought someone who was free!

subtitles.original: おい！暇じゃねえんだよ、ふざけんじゃねえ！ららら...！
subtitles.english: Hey! I'm not free, don't mess around! Lalala...!

subtitles.original: 船長！
subtitles.english: Senchou!

subtitles.original: でもさ、船長さ、めっちゃ可愛いからさー！
subtitles.english: But Senchou, you're so cute!

subtitles.original: 船長めっちゃ可愛いからさ！
subtitles.english: Senchou, because you're so cute!

subtitles.original: 一緒に歌おう？
subtitles.english: Want to sing together?

subtitles.original: うん、歌う、マリンと歌おう！
subtitles.english: Yeah, I'll sing, let's sing with Marine!

subtitles.original: 一緒に歌おうね！歌おう！
subtitles.english: Let's sing together! Let's sing!

subtitles.original: 「好き」って言って 「好き」って言って
subtitles.english: Say "I love you," say "I love you"

subtitles.original: 他に何もいらないから
subtitles.english: Because I don't need anything else

subtitles.original: ねえ「好き」って言って 忘れないように
subtitles.english: Hey, say "I love you," so I won't forget

subtitles.original: 君以外はいらないから
subtitles.english: Because I don't need anyone but you

subtitles.original: 君の声が好きなんです
subtitles.english: I love your voice

subtitles.original: 君の放つ言葉すべて
subtitles.english: Every word you say

subtitles.original: 漏らすことなく聞きたいんだ
subtitles.english: I want to hear them all without missing a single one

subtitles.original: そうつまりは僕の推しよ
subtitles.english: In short, you are my oshi

subtitles.original: 君の顔が好きなんです
subtitles.english: I love your face

subtitles.original: 笑う顔も 照れた顔も
subtitles.english: Your smiling face, and your blushing face

subtitles.original: そのすべてを見たいんです
subtitles.english: I want to see it all

subtitles.original: 余すことなく君をソロばん
subtitles.english: I'll take it all in, solo counting you

subtitles.original: あわよくばシワになるまで
subtitles.english: If possible, until we're wrinkled

subtitles.original: 死ぬ時もメロメロでいるから
subtitles.english: Even when I die, I'll be head over heels

subtitles.original: 君の夢をすべて叶えたいんだ
subtitles.english: I want to make all your dreams come true

subtitles.original: おじゃま虫 僕の夢なんだ
subtitles.english: The nuisance, it's my dream

subtitles.original: ねえ「好き」って言って 「好き」って言って
subtitles.english: Hey, say "I love you," say "I love you"

subtitles.original: 他に何もいらないから
subtitles.english: Because I don't need anything else

subtitles.original: ねえ「好き」って言って 忘れないように
subtitles.english: Hey, say "I love you," so I won't forget

subtitles.original: 君以外はいらないから
subtitles.english: Because I don't need anyone but you

subtitles.original: 君の胸が好きなんです
subtitles.english: I love your chest

subtitles.original: 小さすぎず 大きすぎず
subtitles.english: Not too small, not too big

subtitles.original: まさに理想 完璧だけど
subtitles.english: It's exactly ideal, it's perfect, but

subtitles.original: 君はまだまだ足りないという
subtitles.english: You say it's still not enough
